title: Frontend Developer Intern
shortDescription: Join our frontend team to build amazing user interfaces.
description: Work with React and Tailwind to build responsive UI components. You will be responsible for creating and maintaining our component library and collaborating with designers.

title: Data Analyst Intern
shortDescription: Analyze large datasets and generate valuable insights.
description: Assist in data cleaning, analysis and visualization using Python and SQL. You will work with our data science team on real-world business problems.
eligibility: Final year students with good analytical skills

title: Backend Engineer Intern
shortDescription: Work on our scalable backend services.
description: Help design APIs and work on scalable backend systems using Node.js and Express. You will gain experience in database management and cloud deployment.
eligibility: B.Tech students familiar with backend tech stack
